casebody.data:
State
v.
Ercoli 2018-0675 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 18, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

Sua sponte, pages 16 through 22 of appellant's memorandum in support of jurisdiction stricken for failure to comply with S.Ct.Prac.R. 7.02(B), which requires that a memorandum "shall not exceed fifteen numbered pages, exclusive of the table of contents and the certificate of service."
